channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jake Boggs

item.title: Translating Historical Manuscripts with Gemini 3
item.description: An app for transcribing and translating historical manuscripts using Gemini 3 and GPT-5.2. Built as an early Christmas present for my girlfriend.

item.title: Scalable Reinforcement Learning with LLMs - Atropos Guide
item.description: Quick intro to Atropos, the RL framework from Nous Research. Written while prepping for their hackathon, where I got 2nd place with an environment for teaching LLMs how to write jokes.

item.title: Evaluating Reasoning in LLMs Through MTG Deck Building
item.description: ManaBench is my benchmark for testing LLM reasoning using Magic: The Gathering deck building. Models are tasked with picking the best card from 6 options to complete a deck.

item.title: Introducing Manamorphosis: A Diffusion Model for MTG Deck Generation
item.description: I trained a diffusion model to complete Magic: The Gathering decklists. Give it some cards, it fills in the rest. Trained on 47k tournament decks.

item.title: Gait Analysis for Physical Therapy with YOLOv11
item.description: Built a video analysis tool for my mom’s physical therapy research. Uses YOLOv11-pose for automatic joint detection with a drag-to-correct interface.

item.title: AccountaBuddy: An AI Accountability Partner - HackNC 2024
item.description: Weekend hackathon project that calls your phone to check on your tasks.

item.title: Daily Yap: A Synthetically Generated Conversational Audio Dataset
item.description: 90-hour conversational audio dataset. Used GPT-4o to clean up Daily Dialog transcripts and XTTS v2 to synthesize speech with 8 different voices. Available on HuggingFace.

item.title: Large Language Models for Magic: the Gathering
item.description: One of my early attempts at teaching LLMs to understand MTG. Created a dataset of 80k question-answer pairs covering card text, rulings, and combos, then fine-tuned Llama 3 8B with QLoRA.
